title: How acid trips led to better policing | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Thirty years ago, Eugene, Oregon, figured out an alternative to the police. They called it CAHOOTS. Seriously.

itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: 2020 was a big year for police reform. One alternative to policing in Eugene, Oregon, could be a model for the rest of the country.
